ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I become anxious if I have to write in front of other people.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I become self-conscious when using public toilets.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I can suddenly become aware of my own voice and of others listening to me.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I get nervous that people are staring at me as I walk down the street.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I fear I may blush when I am with others.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I feel self-conscious if I have to enter a room where others are already seated.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I worry about shaking or trembling when I'm watched by other people.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I would get tense if I had to sit facing other people on a bus or a train.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I get panicky that others might see me faint, or be sick or ill.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I would find it difficult to drink something if in a group of people.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: It would make me feel self-conscious to eat in front of a stranger at a restaurant.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I am worried people will think my behavior odd.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I would get tense if I had to carry a tray across a crowded cafeteria.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I worry I'll lose control of myself in front of other people.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I worry I might do something to attract the attention of other people.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: When in an elevator, I am tense if people look at me.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I can feel conspicuous standing in a line.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I can get tense when I speak in front of other people.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1= Slightly; 2= Moderately; 3= Very; 4= Extremely; 99=Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: I worry my head will shake or nod in front of others.

ElementDescription: I feel awkward and tense if I know people are watching me.

ElementDescription: Social Phobia Scale summary score
